ActivityMetadata.Name: PD List users on call
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD List users on call
ActivityMetadata.Description:
List all of the users on call in a given schedule for a given time range.
A Schedule determines the time periods that users are On-Call.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#schedules)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

List users on call.

List all of the users on call in a given schedule for a given time range. A Schedule determines the time periods that users are On-Call. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#schedules)

Method: Get

OperationID: listScheduleUsers

EndPoint:

/schedules/{id}/users
